    • Constructor Detail

      • PlatformRoom

        public PlatformRoom(DunGen parent,
                    java.lang.String name,
                    com.sk89q.worldedit.Vector targetL,
                    Helper.Direc towardsD)
        Constructor takes same arguments as a Module and Room and forwards these. Then loads config.
        Parameters:
        parent - The parent Plugin for member access
        name - The name of this module, as well as .schematic and .yml files
        targetL - The location of the entry as global vector (lower left free(air or door) block)
        towardsD - Direction the dungeon is facing (inwards)

        PlatformRoom checks whether one player has reached the target area.
        Specified by:
        checkRoomDone in class Room
        Parameters:
        v - A Void object that will not be used. Only necessary to use the method reference here.
        Returns:
        Void only for method reference implementation. Return null.

      • loadConfig

        public void loadConfig()
        Description copied from class: Room
        Calls the Module::loadConfig() for basic values. Then loads the properties special for Rooms. For Room, this means initializing the Task objects. Checks are not needed any more due to initial yml checks.
        Overrides:
        loadConfig in class Room
